dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Alright, so, Kazhydromet, you know, our go-to for weather, they've dropped the forecast for Astana and Almaty for the next few days.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Alright, so, Kazhydromet, you know, our go-to for weather, they've dropped the forecast for Astana and Almaty for the next few days.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazhydromet meteorologists have shared the weather forecast for Astana and Almaty for the upcoming three days " June 19 to 21.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, nice! June 19th to 21st, right? What are we looking at?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, nice! June nineteenth to twenty first, right? What are we looking at?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazhydromet meteorologists have shared the weather forecast for Astana and Almaty for the upcoming three days " June 19 to 21.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, exactly. Let's start with Astana. The 19th, uh, partly cloudy, but expect occasional rain, thunderstorms, and hail.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, exactly. Let's start with Astana. The nineteenth, uh, partly cloudy, but expect occasional rain, thunderstorms, and hail.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: June 19: Partly cloudy skies are expected. Occasional rain, possible thunderstorms and hail.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Whoa, so, like, pretty unstable then? And the heat's subsiding?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Whoa, so, like, pretty unstable then? And the heat's subsiding?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The weather will be unstable " the heat will begin to subside, and winds will pick up.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Totally! Winds picking up, heat starting to go down. Daytime temps, um, 27 to 29 Celsius.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally! Winds picking up, heat starting to go down. Daytime temps, um, twenty seven to twenty nine Celsius.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Southwest wind at 9"14 m/s, with gusts reaching 15"20 m/s during the day. Nighttime temperatures will be +20¦+22ÂC, daytime +27¦+29ÂC. The weather will be unstable " the heat will begin to subside, and winds will pick up.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Okay. And the 20th? More of the same?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay. And the twentieth? More of the same?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Still partly cloudy, more rain, storms, hail possible again. But it'll feel cooler, like, 23 to 25 during the day.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Still partly cloudy, more rain, storms, hail possible again. But it'll feel cooler, like, twenty three to twenty five during the day.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: June 20: Continued partly cloudy conditions. Occasional rain and thunderstorms, hail possible again during the day. ... Nighttime temperatures +18¦+20ÂC, daytime +23¦+25ÂC. Rain and wind will persist, and it will feel cooler.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, a definite cooling trend.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, a definite cooling trend.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A gradual cooling trend will continue amid unstable weather.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yep. And the 21st, even cooler. Rain, thunderstorms, potential hail. Daytime temps, uh, 22 to 24.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yep. And the twenty first, even cooler. Rain, thunderstorms, potential hail. Daytime temps, uh, twenty two to twenty four.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: June 21: Partly cloudy skies remain. Rain, thunderstorms, and potential hail are expected. ... Night temperatures +16¦+18ÂC, daytime +22¦+24ÂC.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] Sounds like a lot of rain for Astana, then.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Sounds like a lot of rain for Astana, then.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It does! Now, Almaty is, like, a whole different story for the 19th.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It does! Now, Almaty is, like, a whole different story for the nineteenth.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, really? What's happening there?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, really? What's happening there?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, no precipitation expected, but extreme heat. We're talking 37 to 39 degrees Celsius. One of the hottest days of June!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, no precipitation expected, but extreme heat. We're talking thirty seven to thirty nine degrees Celsius. One of the hottest days of June!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: June 19: Partly cloudy, no precipitation expected. ... and extreme daytime heat of +37¦+39ÂC. This will be one of the hottest days of June.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh my gosh, that's intense!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh my gosh, that's intense!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right? But then the 20th, after that heat, short showers, heavy rain in some areas, storms, hail, squally winds. Drops to 29 to 31.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? But then the twentieth, after that heat, short showers, heavy rain in some areas, storms, hail, squally winds. Drops to twenty nine to thirty one.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: June 20: Partly cloudy skies. Short showers are expected during the day, with some areas seeing heavy rain, thunderstorms, hail, and squally winds. ... daytime +29¦+31ÂC.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, heat, then the storms roll in.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, heat, then the storms roll in.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Showers and wind will follow the heat.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Uh-huh. And the 21st, more brief showers, possible storms overnight. Daytime 31 to 33. Cooler nights though.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh-huh. And the twenty first, more brief showers, possible storms overnight. Daytime thirty one to thirty three. Cooler nights though.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: June 21: Partly cloudy. Short rain showers and possible thunderstorms during the night. ... daytime +31¦+33ÂC. Expect cooler nights and brief rainfall.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, overall, for both cities, it sounds like June is just, like, super unpredictable?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, overall, for both cities, it sounds like June is just, like, super unpredictable?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Pretty much! Kazhydromet actually said June 2025 overall will be unstable – alternating cool and hot spells, rain, storms, hail, even dust storms some days.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Pretty much! Kazhydromet actually said June twenty twenty five overall will be unstable - alternating cool and hot spells, rain, storms, hail, even dust storms some days.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, Kazhydromet meteorologists released the weather forecast for June 2025 in Kazakhstan. Unstable conditions are expected throughout the month, alternating between cool and hot spells, accompanied by rain (sometimes heavy), thunderstorms, hail, and squally winds. On some days, dust storms are also possible.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yikes! So, pack for everything, huh?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yikes! So, pack for everything, huh?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely!
